channel.title: [317] Project Hybrid World
channel.description:
.•*´¨) `¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨) (¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Combat Introduction [QUOTE]My Fourth Server Maybe. Please Don't Me Mean, I'm Still A New Coder, Don't Flame Or Something Like That. I'm Still Learning This Java Programming Language. I Will Be Updating This Topic Whenever I Make Some New Updates! Credits Are Provided Below : ) Please Tell Me How I Am Doing! If Anyone Wants To Help, Please PM Me Or Leave Their Email Address So I Can Contact Them. My Old MoparScape Account Was JlKripstir. If You Want To Add Me Go On Ahead : ) Please Respect My Work. Hope This Interests You Or Whateverrr, Enjoyyy.[/QUOTE]
.•*´¨) `¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨) (¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Combat Information
[QUOTE]-Includes facing and following when attacking -Sword, bow, arrows, runes of you're a mage -New bow animation, similar to Runescape -All weapons include the correct animations -All weapons have the correct amount of stats -Weapons have correct timing, so it's not laggy -Godsword stances, blocking, attacking, running, walking -Godsword specials have no lag, no custom specials added -Combat can be slowed down and interrupted when eating -Correct weapons have the correct special attacks -Able to adjust when you are weilding a sword, dagger, 2H sword -Adjustments such as stab, block, smash, slash, lunge, etc -Adjustments depend on the weaponary you are using -Auto retaliation can be adjusted, turned on or off [/QUOTE]
.•*´¨) `¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨) (¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Shops Information
[QUOTE]-Correct items with the correct stats -Proper stores, such as General Store, Range Shop, etc -No rares in the stores, like Dragon Claws, Dragon Chainbody -Items can be sold in certain stores at certain prices -Store items contain whatever RuneScape stores have -Economical stores that sell useful items for skilling, etc -Working buying options such as Buy 1, 5, 10 -Whatever you sell in the shop, it will stay there until someone buys it -Items that are sold in the shop will be cleared out when server restarts [/QUOTE]
.•*´¨) `¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨) (¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Eating And Prayer
[QUOTE]-Prayer fully works with certain bones, bones that are used most often -Prayer can be restored at an altar in Lumbridge, Varrock, etc -Prayer messages are correct, similar to RuneScape, when you bury bones. -Eating fully working with the correct HP that it heals -Depends on what kind of food you're eating, Manta heals more than Lobsters -Potions are working as well, Attack Potion, Strength Potion, Prayer Potion, etc -Can interrupt combat and slow down the combat hitting until the next hit -Are able to make potions such as Prayer Potion, Strength Potion, more [/QUOTE]
.•*´¨) `¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨) (¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Other Skills
[QUOTE]-All skills can be trainable, not sure about some, but mostly you can -Woodcutting works, you can cut any tree in Hybrid World. -Tree gives you correct logs, Yew Tree for yew logs, Oak Tree for oaks -Firemaking can be trainable, Tinderbox and some logs -Fires will burn out when the server restarts, I think, or timing -It can also burn out when the person that made it logs off -Crafting works, you can use Chisel on a gem and produce a amulet -Experience rates are reasonable, not too fast, not too slow -Other skills also work, I think they are pretty straight forward [/QUOTE]
•*´¨) `¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨) (¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Communication
[QUOTE]-Public chatting works, with colours set on the client -Private chatting also works, with split chat or on the charbox -Able to add friends and ignores if you hate anyone, but try to be friendly -Can see when your friend logs in out, etc [/QUOTE]
.•*´¨) `¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨) (¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Items Information
[QUOTE]-Global items such as logs at Lumbrige, Leather Shoes in AlKharid -Items are droppable, except for money because people can drop large amounts -Items will be global after the timing of one minute, and can be picked up -Items can be seen right away after the NPC the person killed is dead -Whatever item drops will remain there for a certain amount of time -After amount of time, the item will dissapear and will not be seen -All items have the correct amount of stats and the correct price -Items are at reasonable prices, not too expensive or cheap, more economic [/QUOTE]
.•*´¨) `¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨) (¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Minigame Informations
[QUOTE]-Pest Control fully working, with the timing and portals -Pest Control points are supplied when portals are killed -You can exchange your points in for ingame items, Void Armour and more -Can exchange your points for ingame experience points for stats -Fight Pits, a custom made minigame enjoyed by many players -There is a timer until the game will start and players will be teleported -Teleported at random areas in Fight Pits area -Just like RuneScape, this mini-games involves a complete Multi Battle Area -The winner, remaining player after everyone has lost will recieve a prize -Barrows is working, but not fully -Use the barrows teleport command and use spade on one of the humps -You will be teleported somewhere when you use spade -Kill one brother and you will be teleported to the next -Each barrows brother drops certain items such as Verac will drop Verac armour -Other minigames such as Assault with Assault points -Exchange the points for items such as Fighter Torso, Fight Hat, etc [/QUOTE]
[QUOTE]I will be updating this thread whenever I make some updates. I dunno when it's going to be released yet : P [/QUOTE]
*Update 1 Topic Has Been Updated! I Have Added Real RuneScape Fishing. Fishing Spots Will Move At A Certain Period Of Time. Fishing Emotes When Fishing Whatever You Are Fishing Such As When Fishing Sharks You Do The Stabbing Emote, Etc.
*Update 2 Topic Has Been Updated Once Again. This Time I Have Added 500+ Standing Emotes, Similar To RuneScape. This Emote Allows The Body, Arms Move From Side To Side. It May Sound Stupid But It's Actually Pretty Good, Check Out The Video I Have Made Not Too Long Ago On This.
>> [URL=http://sv.tinypic.com/r/t69s7q/6]View My Video[/URL] <<
*Update 3 Topic Has Been Updated Again Lolz, I Have Added Emotes For Lesser Demons, They Look Realistic And I Added A New NPC. The NPC Is Called BarrelChest. It's Bascially A Large Beast Holding Some BarrelChest Anchors, They Drop Rares, Like Dragon Med Helm, Dragon Sq Shields, Dragon Bones, Daggers, Potions, Etc I Made Another Video For That.
>> [URL=http://sv.tinypic.com/r/somqoo/6]View My Video[/URL] <<
>> [URL=http://sv.tinypic.com/r/2le12f5/6]View My Video[/URL] <<
Wish Me Luck. : ) Credits Provided Below.
.•*´¨) `¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨) (¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Pictures [img]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/3125/0007z.png[/img] [img]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/4559/0001x.png[/img] [img]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/5346/0006o.png[/img] [img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/8898/0002nj.png[/img] [img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/9259/0000f.png[/img] [img]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/8843/0008e.png[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/530/0005f.png[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/6380/0003y.png[/img] [img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/1142/0004b.png[/img] [img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/5596/0009h.png[/img] [img]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/5686/0010h.png[/img] [img]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/5889/0011w.png[/img]
.•*´¨) `¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨) (¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Credits -Swat -SilentCJ -Some People Of Other Websites (Won't Tell) -Some Tutorials Of Other Websites (Won't Tell) -And Some Other People, I Hope You Know Who You Aree!
Sorry, I Will Be Posting Pictures Soon! : ) Thanks For Reading! <3<3
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My New Account, JlStepper : ) Same Picture : P Add Me If You Like.

item.title: [317] Project Hybrid World
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“JlStepper, post:12, topic:325681”]Yeap I know but, adding stuff to make it look like 508 shows that you kinda have the skill to do that.
Rather than just going for a 508 with graphics and everything already integrated in, so theres
not much to change in 508s.[/quote]

Lol, the majority of those models are from Garyking on rune serba, also almost all the animations…

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Hybrid World
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“Berky-Scape, post:5, topic:325681”]It’s a nice server but I think these servers just ruin the love for the 317’s.
Like the old ways, old pickaxes old textures, old everything. It’s just nice, and now people are making 317’s into 525’s…
That doesn’t have any sence, just edit a 525 into yours, why making a big deal about it?
I think 317 is an old 317 nothing more.
If you wan’t HD and new rs go make a 525 or 508 or go play real Runescape.[/quote]

I agree 100%

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Hybrid World
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

alexahnon:

Also just to tell you, we gotta move players away from Delta since its overused.

Yea i know, no-one will though, These new coders want a stable and easy to understand base, which would be an un-packaged base, but hyperion, iClarity, emulous, final devo 2.7 are all packaged. I personally think that we need to almost refactor hyperion abit, and make it easier for new coders to understand.

And yes i’m probably going to get flamed for this, but rs2hd, rs2dv, and Hyperion frameworks are all immensely confusing when you start out, and not many people want to download an IDE.

ALso, final devo it nulled pretty bad, once every 20 mins or so, i had around 30 online for testing, and it wasn’t too good. Might have been some shitty coding on my part, i don’t know, it was my second source so i really can’t judge it.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Hybrid World
item.dc:creator: @alexahnon alexahnon
item.description:
@alexahnon wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:8, topic:325681”][quote author=alexahnon link=topic=422088.msg3098462#msg3098462 date=1263560885]
But I don’t want to argue, didn’t think before posting. Sorry.
O’ well, once again, good luck.
[/quote]
yea i know bout that, i’ve got this bookmarked, it has potential in my opinion.

And yea, my first source ever was devo 2.7 and i got the server all done, full skills etc, and when i tried to host it nulled like crazy.

But yea, stay delta ftw, copy and paste alot of stuff to final devo 2.7 later on.[/quote]

How did it null?
I just tested my Devo 2.7 source, hosted with a lil above 20 players, no nulls or much lag.
Also just to tell you, we gotta move players away from Delta since its overused.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Hybrid World
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

[quote=“alexahnon, post:7, topic:325681”]But I don’t want to argue, didn’t think before posting. Sorry.
O’ well, once again, good luck. :)[/quote]
yea i know bout that, i’ve got this bookmarked, it has potential in my opinion.

And yea, my first source ever was devo 2.7 and i got the server all done, full skills etc, and when i tried to host it nulled like crazy.

But yea, stay delta ftw, copy and paste alot of stuff to final devo 2.7 later on.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Hybrid World
item.dc:creator: @alexahnon alexahnon
item.description:
@alexahnon wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:6, topic:325681”][quote author=alexahnon link=topic=422088.msg3098383#msg3098383 date=1263552208]
Also, IF your using Delta, I recommend you to switch to either iClarity, Devo 2.7 or Emulous, those are better bases and are easy to code with (Both iClarity and Devo 2.7 already have great combat added). Also, if you want an challenge, you could always go Hyperion. ;D
[/quote]
alright i disagree with this, i coded final devo 2.7 and seeing as how most of the stuff he added has been content and not too much gameplay if he goes 2.7 he will fail most likely because final devo has no null handling.
iClarity isn’t bad, i like it, but personally i prefer emulous combat better.

Also hyperion would confuse the shit out of this guy, none of the variables / voids / booleans are remotely similar to wL, and he also probably would have a hard time understanding the packaging.

Personally man, id stick with delta for now if this is your first source because you can just c & p large amounts of code from delta to other sources later on.[/quote]

I do have to agree that Devo 2.7 will fail if he’s new to coding.
Second of all, I did say “if you want a challenge, you could always go Hyperion.” I don’t expect or recommend him to do it.

But I don’t want to argue, didn’t think before posting. Sorry.
O’ well, once again, good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Hybrid World
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

alexahnon:

Also, IF your using Delta, I recommend you to switch to either iClarity, Devo 2.7 or Emulous, those are better bases and are easy to code with (Both iClarity and Devo 2.7 already have great combat added). Also, if you want an challenge, you could always go Hyperion. ;D

alright i disagree with this, i coded final devo 2.7 and seeing as how most of the stuff he added has been content and not too much gameplay if he goes 2.7 he will fail most likely because final devo has no null handling.
iClarity isn’t bad, i like it, but personally i prefer emulous combat better.

Also hyperion would confuse the shit out of this guy, none of the variables / voids / booleans are remotely similar to wL, and he also probably would have a hard time understanding the packaging.

Personally man, id stick with delta for now if this is your first source because you can just c & p large amounts of code from delta to other sources later on.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Hybrid World
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

It’s a nice server but I think these servers just ruin the love for the 317’s.
Like the old ways, old pickaxes old textures, old everything. It’s just nice, and now people are making 317’s into 525’s…
That doesn’t have any sence, just edit a 525 into yours, why making a big deal about it?
I think 317 is an old 317 nothing more.
If you wan’t HD and new rs go make a 525 or 508 or go play real Runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Hybrid World
item.dc:creator: @alexahnon alexahnon
item.description:
@alexahnon wrote:

Only thing I see so far is Custom items and 1 easy emote. But I’ll look forward to it when the real coding comes in.
I wish you good luck with this, and just saying, your gameframe sideicons are off and you need to fix your Combat boxes for Bows.
Also, IF your using Delta, I recommend you to switch to either iClarity, Devo 2.7 or Emulous, those are better bases and are easy to code with (Both iClarity and Devo 2.7 already have great combat added). Also, if you want an challenge, you could always go Hyperion. ;D
Also tell me what base your gonna use, I would like to know.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Hybrid World
item.dc:creator: @JlStepper JlStepper
item.description:
@JlStepper wrote:

.•*´¨)
`¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨)
(¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Combat Introduction

[QUOTE]My Fourth Server Maybe. Please Don’t Me Mean, I’m Still A New Coder, Don’t Flame Or Something Like
That. I’m Still Learning This Java Programming Language. I Will Be Updating This Topic Whenever I Make
Some New Updates! Credits Are Provided Below : ) Please Tell Me How I Am Doing! If Anyone Wants To Help,
Please PM Me Or Leave Their Email Address So I Can Contact Them. My Old MoparScape Account Was JlKripstir.
If You Want To Add Me Go On Ahead : ) Please Respect My Work. Hope This Interests You Or Whateverrr, Enjoyyy.[/QUOTE]

.•*´¨)
`¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨)
(¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Combat Information

[QUOTE]-Includes facing and following when attacking
-Sword, bow, arrows, runes of you’re a mage
-New bow animation, similar to Runescape
-All weapons include the correct animations
-All weapons have the correct amount of stats
-Weapons have correct timing, so it’s not laggy
-Godsword stances, blocking, attacking, running, walking
-Godsword specials have no lag, no custom specials added
-Combat can be slowed down and interrupted when eating
-Correct weapons have the correct special attacks
-Able to adjust when you are weilding a sword, dagger, 2H sword
-Adjustments such as stab, block, smash, slash, lunge, etc
-Adjustments depend on the weaponary you are using
-Auto retaliation can be adjusted, turned on or off [/QUOTE]

.•*´¨)
`¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨)
(¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Shops Information

[QUOTE]-Correct items with the correct stats
-Proper stores, such as General Store, Range Shop, etc
-No rares in the stores, like Dragon Claws, Dragon Chainbody
-Items can be sold in certain stores at certain prices
-Store items contain whatever RuneScape stores have
-Economical stores that sell useful items for skilling, etc
-Working buying options such as Buy 1, 5, 10
-Whatever you sell in the shop, it will stay there until someone buys it
-Items that are sold in the shop will be cleared out when server restarts [/QUOTE]

.•*´¨)
`¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨)
(¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Eating And Prayer

[QUOTE]-Prayer fully works with certain bones, bones that are used most often
-Prayer can be restored at an altar in Lumbridge, Varrock, etc
-Prayer messages are correct, similar to RuneScape, when you bury bones.
-Eating fully working with the correct HP that it heals
-Depends on what kind of food you’re eating, Manta heals more than Lobsters
-Potions are working as well, Attack Potion, Strength Potion, Prayer Potion, etc
-Can interrupt combat and slow down the combat hitting until the next hit
-Are able to make potions such as Prayer Potion, Strength Potion, more [/QUOTE]

.•*´¨)
`¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨)
(¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Other Skills

[QUOTE]-All skills can be trainable, not sure about some, but mostly you can
-Woodcutting works, you can cut any tree in Hybrid World.
-Tree gives you correct logs, Yew Tree for yew logs, Oak Tree for oaks
-Firemaking can be trainable, Tinderbox and some logs
-Fires will burn out when the server restarts, I think, or timing
-It can also burn out when the person that made it logs off
-Crafting works, you can use Chisel on a gem and produce a amulet
-Experience rates are reasonable, not too fast, not too slow
-Other skills also work, I think they are pretty straight forward [/QUOTE]

•*´¨)
`¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨)
(¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Communication

[QUOTE]-Public chatting works, with colours set on the client
-Private chatting also works, with split chat or on the charbox
-Able to add friends and ignores if you hate anyone, but try to be friendly
-Can see when your friend logs in out, etc [/QUOTE]

.•*´¨)
`¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨)
(¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Items Information

[QUOTE]-Global items such as logs at Lumbrige, Leather Shoes in AlKharid
-Items are droppable, except for money because people can drop large amounts
-Items will be global after the timing of one minute, and can be picked up
-Items can be seen right away after the NPC the person killed is dead
-Whatever item drops will remain there for a certain amount of time
-After amount of time, the item will dissapear and will not be seen
-All items have the correct amount of stats and the correct price
-Items are at reasonable prices, not too expensive or cheap, more economic [/QUOTE]

.•*´¨)
`¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨)
(¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Minigame Informations

[QUOTE]-Pest Control fully working, with the timing and portals
-Pest Control points are supplied when portals are killed
-You can exchange your points in for ingame items, Void Armour and more
-Can exchange your points for ingame experience points for stats
-Fight Pits, a custom made minigame enjoyed by many players
-There is a timer until the game will start and players will be teleported
-Teleported at random areas in Fight Pits area
-Just like RuneScape, this mini-games involves a complete Multi Battle Area
-The winner, remaining player after everyone has lost will recieve a prize
-Barrows is working, but not fully
-Use the barrows teleport command and use spade on one of the humps
-You will be teleported somewhere when you use spade
-Kill one brother and you will be teleported to the next
-Each barrows brother drops certain items such as Verac will drop Verac armour
-Other minigames such as Assault with Assault points
-Exchange the points for items such as Fighter Torso, Fight Hat, etc [/QUOTE]

I will be updating this thread whenever I make some updates. I dunno when it’s going to be released yet : P

*Update 1
Topic Has Been Updated! I Have Added Real RuneScape Fishing. Fishing Spots Will Move At A Certain Period Of Time.
Fishing Emotes When Fishing Whatever You Are Fishing Such As When Fishing Sharks You Do The Stabbing Emote, Etc.

*Update 2
Topic Has Been Updated Once Again. This Time I Have Added 500+ Standing Emotes, Similar To RuneScape. This Emote
Allows The Body, Arms Move From Side To Side. It May Sound Stupid But It’s Actually Pretty Good, Check Out The Video
I Have Made Not Too Long Ago On This.

View My Video <<

*Update 3
Topic Has Been Updated Again Lolz, I Have Added Emotes For Lesser Demons, They Look Realistic And I Added A New NPC.
The NPC Is Called BarrelChest. It’s Bascially A Large Beast Holding Some BarrelChest Anchors, They Drop Rares, Like Dragon
Med Helm, Dragon Sq Shields, Dragon Bones, Daggers, Potions, Etc I Made Another Video For That.

View My Video <<

View My Video <<

Wish Me Luck. : ) Credits Provided Below.

.•*´¨)
`¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨)
(¸.•´ (¸.• Hybrid World Pictures











.•*´¨)
`¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨)

Sorry, I Will Be Posting Pictures Soon! : ) Thanks For Reading! <3<3
